flawed_nl_solution:
The guitar costs $100 every month for 12 months so it costs 100*12 = $<<100*12=1200>>1200
His dad is charging him 10% interest on the $1200 so interest comes to 0.1*1200 = $<<1200*0.1=210>>210
All total, Aaron will owe his father the price of the guitar, $1200 and the interest, $210 so 1200+210 = $<<1200+210=1410>>1410
#### 1410

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 210. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
